pages.name: Death Worm
pages.text: $(thing)Death worms$()$(#734608) are incredibly long desert worms covered in hard chitin and a lashing tongue and bite

$(#734608)Death worms come in 3 color variants: $(#968660)tan$()$(#734608), $(#a8a8a8)white$()$(#734608), and $(#872904)red$()$(#734608)$(br2)They can be found burrowing underneath deserts and will eat absolutely anything it comes across.$(br2)When attacking, they will leap out of the sand to bite their prey.$(br2)$(thing)Giant death worms$()$(#734608) are capable of displacing a large crater of sand.

$(#734608)It will also eat TNT and explodes shortly after doing so.$(br2)When killed, death worms can drop $(item)death worm chitin$()$(#734608), rotten flesh, a death worm egg, and rarely a $(item)death worm tongue$()$(#734608)$(br2)$(item)Death worm chitin$()$(#734608) can be used to form armor or combined with a death worm tongue to make a $(item)deathworm gauntlet$()
